summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Aquarium; authorizing the loan of funds from the City's Consolidated (Residual) Cash Pool, or its participating funds, to the 2007 Multipurpose LTGO Bond Fund; increasing an appropriation in the 2006 Adopted Budget; amending the Adopted 2006-2011 Capital Improvement Program; and authorizing an agreement with the Seattle Aquarium Society for use and further development of portions of the Aquarium; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
